title: Glyphs Like These
content:
{Cross-posted with ID section.)

What are some fonts with glyphs of this style?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cfj_4560.gif)

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: Some Peignot-like designs referred to in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806/http:/typophile.com/node/77996). Also: ![Néo-Peignot, 1966](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806im_/http:/collections.bm-lyon.fr/MIL_01CTF00101125MG01/Source0.jpg) ![Ile-de-France, 1956–61](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806im_/http:/collections.bm-lyon.fr/MIL_01CTF00101089MG01/Source0.jpg)

Some great finds - thanks!  
Maxim, those are amazing.

hhp

A.V. Panov's Edrip is close but not all there.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Edrip-Regular_4536.png)

Hrant, also check [Arsenal](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806/http:/www.ukrainian-type.com/fontarsenal/) by Andriy Shevchenko.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821102806im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Arsenal_3748.png)
